# rversions — past and present R versions

## Installation

```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("metacran/rversions")
```

## Usage

### R-release and R-oldrel

```{r}
library(rversions)
r_release()
r_oldrel()
```

### All R versions and release dates

```{r}
r_versions()
```
